article_title: New Business Bookings, PPACA, Employment Growth To Drive Revenue

article_metadata.author: Great Speculations

og.description: Automatic Data Processing is set to release its results for the third quarter ended March 31, 2015 on April 30. We expect the human capital management company to have seen growth on business bookings from the previous quarter and purchases of solutions for compliance with the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act. The strong employment conditions in the U.S. should have helped drive ADP's pays per control.
og.title: ADP Earnings Preview: New Business Bookings, PPACA, Employment Growth To Drive Revenue
